about_the_game: Cursor story is a cool and fun game where you play as a cursor (You don't control it with your cursor) in small Bullet-hell-ish levels about precision and timing. You explore all kinds of cool places (like the void and an island inhabited by dinosaurs) and meet cool, interesting, weird and funny characters (like a floating voice, three pirates and a frog (the frog isn't in the demo)). The cursor has lost it's memories so it teams up with the voice to get them back, and get the voice a new body. There's a lot of cool and unusual concepts that will for sure suprise you on your journey and there's about a 95% chance that you will have a good time. (Fun fact: The game was originally made in PowerPoint)
detailed_description: Cursor story is a cool and fun game where you play as a cursor (You don't control it with your cursor) in small Bullet-hell-ish levels about precision and timing. You explore all kinds of cool places (like the void and an island inhabited by dinosaurs) and meet cool, interesting, weird and funny characters (like a floating voice, three pirates and a frog (the frog isn't in the demo)). The cursor has lost it's memories so it teams up with the voice to get them back, and get the voice a new body. There's a lot of cool and unusual concepts that will for sure suprise you on your journey and there's about a 95% chance that you will have a good time. (Fun fact: The game was originally made in PowerPoint)
name: Cursor Story Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: You can probably play it on a potato
  • Processor: You can probably play it on a potato
  • Memory: 108 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Probably good I dont know
  • Storage: 108 MB available space
  • Sound Card: The sound aren't essential but I still recommend being able to hear them
  • VR Support: no
  • Additional Notes: I can play it on my school computer so everyone who can have steam should be able to play it

short_description: Play as a cursor going on an adventure to retrieve it's lost memories. Play through small bullet-hell-ish levels and meet cool, interesting, weird and funny characters.
supported_languages:
English*, Danish
*languages with full audio support
